alert.note: Alert for Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 5:51AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Troup County through 615 AM EST... At 551 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Wares Crossroads to near Ridge Grove, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, West Point, Hogansville, Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, State Line Park, Abbottsford, Piedmont Heights, Harrisonville, Hillcrest, Big Springs, Wares Crossroads, Baughs Crossroads, Smiths Crossroad, Long Cane and Jones Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
